sections: Being a Motorious reader can pay off big with bonus tickets to enter to win the coolest Shelby GT500 raffle ever.
A 760-horsepower supercharged V8, a flashy red and white finish, and one of the most capable suspension packages to ever underpin the

and it is all being given away. That’s right, you could win this Mustang and $25K to cover the taxes and all you have to do to get your name thrown in the hat is make a charitable donation to the Shelby American Collection car museum in Boulder, Colorado. On top of that we are giving Motorious readers a serious leg-up with a promo for bonus tickets.

is a very special example packed with all the options available to the Shelby models. With the Carbon Fiber Track Package with exposed carbon fiber wheels, GT4 track wing, and Michelin Pilot Cup Sport 2 tires, this Mustang is equipped to dominate the competition on the track while luxuries like the Technology Package make for a more road friendly driving experience. Under the hood is a 5.2-liter supercharged cross plane crank V8 with 760 hp and 625 lb.-ft of torque mated to Ford’s dual-clutch transmission with launch control. Putting all that power to good use is an advanced suspension system that includes the MagneRide damping system and ensuring smooth and accurate stops is a set of Brembo brakes.
Topping off an excellent grand prize, this giveaway includes the

Track Attack experience at Ford's Performance Racing School and $25K to cover the taxes. Donations between $25.00 and $2,500.00 will get you entered into the drawing but the more you donate, the more tickets you will get. Oh and don’t forget about your bonus tickets just for being a
